# stall
# flush
# pc_in  				4 hex
# instr 				8 hex
# regwrite.write
# regwrite.reg 			5 bin
# regwrite.data 		8 hex

#### R-type instructions ###

# ADD
0
0
0000
002081b3
0
00011
00000000

# SUB
0
0
0004
401101b3
0
00011
11111111

0
0
0004
001111b3
0
00011
11111111

0
